'''''Vyakarana of the Birds''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to witness [[Sorush]] become a Bloomguard during ''[[As the Khvarena's Light Shows]]''.
==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*{{Lang|{{w|Vyākaraṇa}}|sa=व्याकरण}} is one of the six {{w|Vedangas}}, the auxiliary disciplines of Hinduism connected to the study of the Vedic scriptures. Vyākarana focuses on the rules of Sanskrit grammar and linguistic analysis.
